Package circeIsland.elements

Class Holdable

java.lang.Object
circeIsland.elements.Holdable
public class Holdable
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents all of the items that are able to be held by Circe and added to storage.
Author:
Emma Yu

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage​(processing.core.PImage image)
      Sets the image parameter to the given image
      Parameters:
      image - Picture to be set as image

    • getType

      public int getType()
      Returns the Holdable object's type
      Returns:
      Type of object from 1-13

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the Holdable object's name, mostly for testing purposes
      Returns:
      Name of object as a String

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, float xCoor, float yCoor, float cellWidth, float cellHeight)
      Draws the Holdable object to the given surface depending on its x and y coordinates, width, and height. Draws the object by using its image. If there is no initialized image, does not draw anything
      Parameters:
      surface - DrawingSurface to draw the object on
      xCoor - x-coordinate to draw at
      yCoor - y-coordinate to draw at
      cellWidth - Width to draw at
      cellHeight - Height to draw at

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the type as a string
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Holdable's type as a String

    • setImages

      public static void setImages​(DrawingSurface surface)
      Loads and initializes all images
      Parameters:
      surface - The DrawingSurface to load the images from
